channel.title: Gauntlet Video Roundup Post - February 11, 2022
channel.description:
Greetings, all! [This week's Gauntlet Calendar video roundup post](https://www.gauntlet-rpg.com/blog/gauntlet-video-roundup-february-11-2022) is now up on The Gauntlet Blog! This week we've got sessions of these great games:
* _Bounty of the Week_ * _Delta Green_ * _Fate of the Faerie Queen_ * _Godbound_ * _Gravity RIP_ * _Rascals_ * _Slayers_ * _Stars in the Dark_ * _The Twilight Throne and the Houses of Ruin_ * _Uncharted Worlds 2E_
Thanks go out to all this week's facilitators and players. If you want to join in the fun, head over to the [Gauntlet Calendar category](https://forums.gauntlet-rpg.com/c/gauntlet-calendar) on the Forums to see the latest game announcements, and sign up on the [Gauntlet Calendar](https://gauntletcalendar.com/events) to play!

item.description:
@flatvurm wrote:
